016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.certificates;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.certificates.spi.CertificatesProvider;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.concurrent.CompletableFutures;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.process.Process;
022import com.exoreaction.xorcery.keystores.KeyStores;
023import jakarta.inject.Inject;
024import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
025import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
026import org.bouncycastle.pkcs.PKCS10CertificationRequest;
027import org.glassfish.hk2.api.IterableProvider;
028
029import java.security.KeyStore;
030import java.security.cert.X509Certificate;
031import java.util.ArrayList;
032import java.util.List;
033import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
034import java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage;
035
036public record RequestCertificateProcess(PKCS10CertificationRequest csr,
037                                        CompletableFuture<List<X509Certificate>> result,
038                                        KeyStore keyStore,
039                                        KeyStores keyStores,
040                                        CertificatesConfiguration certificatesConfiguration,
041                                        IterableProvider<CertificatesProvider> providers,
042                                        Logger logger)
043        implements Process<List<X509Certificate>> {
044
045    public record Factory(KeyStores keyStores,
046                          IterableProvider<CertificatesProvider> providers,
047                          Configuration configuration) {
048        @Inject
049        public Factory {
050        }
051
052        public RequestCertificateProcess create(PKCS10CertificationRequest csr) {
053            CertificatesConfiguration certificatesConfig = CertificatesConfiguration.get(configuration);
054            return new RequestCertificateProcess(csr, new CompletableFuture<>(),
055                    keyStores.getKeyStore(certificatesConfig.getCertificateStoreName()), keyStores,
056                    certificatesConfig, providers, LogManager.getLogger(RequestCertificateProcess.class));
057        }
058    }
059
060    @Override
061    public void start() {
062        try {
063            CompletionStage<List<X509Certificate>> certs = null;
064            for (CertificatesProvider provider : providers) {
065                if (certs == null) {
066                    certs = provider.requestCertificates(csr);
067                } else {
068                    certs = certs.thenCombine(provider.requestCertificates(csr), (l1, l2) ->
069                    {
070                        var l3 = new ArrayList<>(l1);
071                        l3.addAll(l2);
072                        return l3;
073                    });
074                }
075            }
076            if (certs != null) {
077                certs.whenComplete(CompletableFutures.transfer(result));
078            } else {
079                logger.warn("No certificate providers found");
080                result.completeExceptionally(new IllegalStateException("No certificate providers found"));
081            }
082        } catch (Throwable e) {
083            logger.warn("Could not create CSR", e);
084            result.completeExceptionally(e);
085        }
086    }
087}
